TEXT: e1: A bank bailout is very, very costly.
e2: For instance, the taxpayer stood in for the failed bank 'Hypo Real Estate' with a three-figure billion amount.

TEXT: e3: That's why we should not allow any additional bank rescues.
CN RELATION: we, allow additional bank rescues (NotCapableOf)/additional bank rescues, allowed (NotReceivesAction)

TEXT: e4: The politicians are trying to appease us with the fact that actually only a tiny amount of all that money was really spent.

TEXT: e5: But even with that tiny amount you could do a lot of good elsewhere.
